channel.title: QT Agile
channel.description: A blog by developers for developers

item.title: 7 Reasons you're not ready to be a Tech Lead
item.description: and what you can do about it - During my time as a developer I’ve noticed some really good devs become frustrated that their goal of becoming a Technical Lead has not been realised. In some cases developers can fixate on the tech lead role before they have developed the skills to fill the role adequately. I’ve not...
